go_data.justification: Histone variant 2AX is involved in the DNA damage response to DSBs and acts by recruiting DNA repair factors to sites of DNA damage.
Phosphorylated H2AX (gammaH2AX) appears to recruit repair proteins to sites of damage in the nucleus.
Histone variant 2AX is a histone protein that binds to DNA.
Histone variant 2AX is involved in the DNA damage response to DSBs.
